website_summaries.verdict: A unique concept with some quality features, but it doesn't always live up to its name when it comes to flying down snowy slopes.
pros: Constructed of durable foam that prevents riders from "feeling every bump."
cons: Handles aren't very durable and have the tendency to break easily
Snow may build up in front of the sled, slowing it down
Not very speedy on all types of snow pack or hills

customer_reviews.title: The worst quality sled
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sled for my 8 year old daughter. The first time she used it, the bottom of the sled got so many cuts as you can see in the first picture. I was upset but didn't return it because we already used it. The second time my daughter used it, one of the handles broke off (second picture). I have bought so many products through Amazon and this is definitely the worst quality product I have ever purchased on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: kent m

customer_reviews.title: Worse, the sled won't get up any speed going ...
customer_reviews.text: We found this to be worthless. It's flimsy and won't last long. Worse, the sled won't get up any speed going down our very steep driveway after a fresh snowfall. I wish our hard plastic and foam Snow Boogie was still sold as that's a far better sled. This screamer went screaming back into its carton the very day it arrived after a trial on a fresh, slick snowfall. Refund complete!
customer_reviews.author: RoxyD

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: This arrived and was a foam sled but bore absolutely no resemblance to that pictured above. It was not a different color as the assorted colors description would suggest but a completely different design, without the brand name in the middle, the seat pad or the funky background. It had boring diagonal strips and no other features. Not what we thought we were buying for our son's birthday and we've arranged to return it. Disappointing it was not as picturered.
customer_reviews.author: tomliboo

customer_reviews.title: Maybe I'm Missing Something??
customer_reviews.text: I caved and let my son have his Sled early before Christmas for our first snow. Out of the box it's a "sweet ride" (my 8 year olds description). A few times down the hill and it didnt seem to go as fast as others we have had in the past which was a big disappointment for him.. Not sure if for this type it has to be worn in a bit? I will update this review after he uses it again.
customer_reviews.author: MellyMass

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother
customer_reviews.text: I am terribly disappointed! I received a sled that looks nothing like the picture! Color's wrong, there's no "seat" as the picture shows, and it's quite small. The length could be my fault - maybe it's listed in the description - but the rest is ridiculous. I needed the sled for a birthday gift immediately, so there was no time to return. But it appears that the bottom is poorly glued onto the top, and probably won't last more that 1 ride.
customer_reviews.author: RKM

customer_reviews.title: Great item! pros
customer_reviews.text: Great item! pros: -super light weigth - smooth bottom makes easy to glide even on wet/melting snow -seems to be of a good quality( used a few days so far) -gender neutral, but bright and cheery colors(easy to spot) -an adult and a child can easily fit on cons: -thin/daughter sat on a snowy ramp and put a bent into the sled -price is a bit high
customer_reviews.author: annaver

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: so far so good for the first winter. Looks like it should last all of next winter as well. I typically don't expect sled to last much more than one winter or two. This one got delayed in shipping but that was on Amazon's fault although disappointing. Price is a little high but I bought during high demand season so what should I expect. Overall good quality I would recommend for most people that are in the market for a decent sled that'll last. Kids love it it's fast and easy to control for the most part.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: You will definitely be seen in this amazing camouflage sled
customer_reviews.text: Grandsons love this sled. The camouflage and bright red lettering are eye catching. This large sled is amazingly light and extremely fast down the hills. Built in handles are an added plus. This sled is big enough for two and to put your legs up and enjoy the ride!
customer_reviews.author: W. Eckroade

customer_reviews.title: Cracked on first outing.
customer_reviews.text: It goes super fast, which is great. I was excited to make multiple additional purchases to replace our other aging sleds upon returning home. Unfortunately, the bottom of the sled cracked on the first outing, about 90 minutes into the fun, which wasn't ideal. It says right on the tag 'will not crack in cold weather.' Temp was 31 and snowy.
customer_reviews.author: WidMamato5

customer_reviews.title: An okay sled
customer_reviews.text: There are a couple things to know about the flexible flyer. I found that I needed to use ski wax when I first obtained the sled to allow it to slide well. Second, any ice will result in the bottom surface tearing. The sled still works but now the bottom surface has a couple tears. Some of the tears are >6". The family has had great fun using it even with the tears.
customer_reviews.author: Spattz

customer_reviews.title: Love these but.
customer_reviews.text: These are our favorite sleds because we have a lot of kids and can fit a bunch in the back of our van. So far the handles have held up, but those are typically first to go. My bigger complaint is the cost - $30??? They are fast, fit two people and are easy to transport though.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: IT IS WHAT IT IS
customer_reviews.text: Trying to find a sled that had a smooth bottom and durable was hard. Sometimes you slide on fresh snow while other times one will slide on compact snow. It isn't the best but is better than anything we have found so far.
customer_reviews.author: MONDAK

customer_reviews.title: Great sled!
customer_reviews.text: Love this style of sleds. They are very fast and lightweight. They hold up better than those plastic molded ones. They only get damaged if you fold them. This size fits one kid well, one adult if you’re small or bend easily.
customer_reviews.author: Dr E

customer_reviews.title: Super Sled
customer_reviews.text: Finally a solid foam sled. My 11 year-old has gone through his fair shair of sleds and this one holds up fabuously to his maniac approach to sledding. He loves that it's fast and the grips are positioned in the right spot. His friends are jealous so 3 more of these sleds have been purchased off Amazon. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: SBS

customer_reviews.title: Great sled, slow delivery
customer_reviews.text: Great other then it took about 2 weeks to arrive! And our snow is about gone!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Took the abuse, but wouldn't recommend for areas that get snow all season.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these for my kids, they weigh between 80-110 lbs. They took these down a moderate incline hill that's about 100-125ft long. They held up, but are severely scratched on the bottom. I'd say they will still be able to use them one more season.
customer_reviews.author: CFam

customer_reviews.title: I did not receive the color scheme that was pictured ...
customer_reviews.text: I did not receive the color scheme that was pictured so that was a little disappointing. Bottom is very slick so it should fly down hills quite well. Does seem to be a little bit flimsy. Haven't had snow yet so I will update this post after we get to actually use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: kids are happy.  Made it through one season so far
customer_reviews.text: The kids have been having fun with this. Has survived a few major collisions (so far had to patch up the kids after colliding with a tree and a fence) and looks like we will get at least another season out of it. Hopefully the same will be true for the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Kanga

customer_reviews.title: I recommend
customer_reviews.text: We bought several of these for the kids. Very fast down the hill. Lightweight
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Medley

customer_reviews.title: Works great down a snowy hill
customer_reviews.text: This version of a sled is nice and lightweight but still boogies down a snow hill. When it first came I was a bit concerned because it felt so light but when we got to the snow it performed great and was easy to hall up hill. A couple next to us was using a toboggan but we were beating them down the hill!
customer_reviews.author: J Mack

customer_reviews.title: doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: the bottom look slippery, it feels slippery but it doesn't slide on packed snow or fresh snow! the price$$$ on this item is about 3 times what a similar sled at Walmart would cost! i would give it a -1 for value and a 0 for performance if i could. i would return this item in a hart beat if, it wasn't such a hassle to package etc.
customer_reviews.author: FES

customer_reviews.title: Fast!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Not sure how many winters we will get out of it though, seems rather flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya P

customer_reviews.title: NO way to steer, even by leaning. Unresponsive.
customer_reviews.text: No way to actually steer at all, even using the "toboggan lean". And no way to attach a rope to pull back up the hill.
customer_reviews.author: WyoRose

customer_reviews.title: Make the best of it
customer_reviews.text: Well they sent the wrong color...I didn't order the army green one...but we were headed to the mountains the next day so kinda stuck... It works great. Grand daughters had fun on a "boy one" they said. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine girl

customer_reviews.title: worked great, broke day 2
customer_reviews.text: The sled was amazing until it broke the second day so we were so bummed. Costco had similar sleds for$20 that my brother had and his are still in perfect condition. We paid $35 for this...totally not worth it
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Dud
customer_reviews.text: Was finally able to use this yesterday, wouldn't travel more than 30 yards before coming to a stop. Smaller one I got works great. Got a dud.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Lewia

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: A thin piece of foam with no real structure. Don't see where this foam will last long. It states for 1kid only and shows 2 kids riding it.
customer_reviews.author: gene mills

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: Light weight and fast. Doubt it will survive any type of rock or wood though.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Standefer

customer_reviews.title: Fast but may spin
customer_reviews.text: Because if super smooth bottom there is a high likelihood kid will not go straight. But my kids still enjoyed it! My kids lost it when they left it outside one night and wind blew it away...very light.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Seams busted in first 10 minutes of use
customer_reviews.text: Fun to use, went down hill well but... the seams started coming apart within the first 10 minutes we were on the snow!
customer_reviews.author: tom

customer_reviews.title: Just add snow
customer_reviews.text: Handle strap broke first trip out but the sliding services slick in super fun going downhill
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fast and fun!
customer_reviews.text: As the title and other reviews point out, this thing is fast, even on a gentle slope. Was a hit with my kids and their friends.
customer_reviews.author: xana

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for snow days!
customer_reviews.text: Works great in the snow! Husband and nephews loved it!
customer_reviews.author: S.Welch

customer_reviews.title: Great sled!
customer_reviews.text: My 6 and 8 year old love this sled! They can easily ride together. I can even ride this with one of them. It slides easily. My kids love that they can make it spin. Very good quality sled!!
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Worth it, need another for other kid now.
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves this sled. Great gift. Fast durable kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect snow sled for kids and adults
customer_reviews.text: The boys absolutely love this glider sled. Easy to use and great, sturdy quality!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: These sleds are horrible. They don’t slide on the snow! The bottom just completely sticks. Even on a steep hill they don’t move. I wish I could return them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product was recommended to me by a friend and it didn't disappoint
customer_reviews.text: This product was recommended to me by a friend and it didn't disappoint. This thing really moves down a hill. I read many complaints about the sturdiness of these sleds but we haven't had any issues yet. They are made of foam so I could see some longevity issues related to heavy duty sledding. My family have only used them for the small hill that makes up our front yard.
customer_reviews.author: Ray H.

customer_reviews.title: It's a good sled so far but the photo makes it look ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a good sled so far but the photo makes it look like it comes up a little on the edges but it doesn't - It's totally flat - Definitely not the best for the really young kids
customer_reviews.author: Tarebear88

customer_reviews.title: So fun and FAST
customer_reviews.text: So fun and FAST!! Lots of different ages people had fun taking turns on this. Held up and is still goin strong. One of the fastest on the hill and always went the furthest. Looking forward to taking this out to the lake this summer as well.
customer_reviews.author: Chad K Bamford

customer_reviews.title: Versatile
customer_reviews.text: Love the product, flexible to have two or one ride and some padding as well.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Dion

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: WE use this for sledding . They are faster than the normal sleds
customer_reviews.author: Dawnaelle Watson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son had a great time in the snow with this sled.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Yoder

customer_reviews.title: The design I received looked nothing like the picture
customer_reviews.text: The design I received looked nothing like the picture. I understood the colors could be different but not the design. Other than that, my daughter likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: lightweight but handle broke
customer_reviews.text: Kids loved that this sled because it is lightweight and can fit two kids but the first time we used it the handle broke
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Must have for snow
customer_reviews.text: Wow! We played with this sled for hours! Very durable. My 7 yr old fits on it laying or sitting on his knees. Light weight so easily carried by youngsters.
customer_reviews.author: Travis F Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: ... nieces and nephews in Alaska they seem to be pleased with
customer_reviews.text: What is a gift for our nieces and nephews in Alaska they seem to be pleased with them
customer_reviews.author: ec

customer_reviews.title: Child likes it
customer_reviews.text: My kids like it. Held up all winter so far.
customer_reviews.author: Bec

customer_reviews.title: Boys Love Them
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a gift for our grandsons and they love them.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Good for deeper snow.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 7 year old to use in deep snow. It's the perfect size for her and slides very good. She likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Hissom

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME Gift, excellent packaging
customer_reviews.text: Sent it as a Christmas gift to my nephews in Philly. AWESOME Gift, excellent packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy.
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a Walmart sled. But after about ten hours of HEAVY duty use (we pull it behind a 4 wheeler), there are no rips nor torn straps.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick D.

customer_reviews.title: Fast Fun
customer_reviews.text: I like this sled. It is soft easy to use. It went the farthest of all the sleds we had. I like that it seems durable and would not snap like the plastic sleds.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Not worth $29
customer_reviews.text: The bottom of the sled ripped within two uses on fresh fluffy snow. My daughter is only 40 lbs and it separated on the sides and has gashes on the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylie Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Wish we had these when I was a kid!
customer_reviews.text: 6 y.o. and 3 y.o. grandsons love it! Lightweight for the return UP the hill, and easy to maneuver.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah L.

customer_reviews.title: My daughter and I love this sled so much that I purchased one for ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and I love this sled so much that I purchased one for me to use as well. It is light weight, easy to carry back up the hill and moves pretty smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: jane k.

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Larger than I thought it would be, which is a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Palani

customer_reviews.title: Nice but could be better
customer_reviews.text: This snow screamer is really nice except for the handles. One of them came off when my daughter was snow boarding. But overall it serves my purpose
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: This thing sucks. Kids took it to mammoth and bottom tore almost immediately.
customer_reviews.author: unknown

customer_reviews.title: OMG I love it
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for me and my 2.5 yr old - we can use it together - and as he got more adventurous over the winter he started using it alone, on his tummy, etc. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Marie's Reveiw

customer_reviews.title: Product doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.text: The sled didn’t even move in the snow. It was completely ineffective.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan M Getz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are well made and FAST! Hoping to get many years of use out of these!
customer_reviews.author: David Parnell

customer_reviews.title: My kids love this sled
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it and now the neighborhood kids want it and their parents are asking where I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Kelzer

customer_reviews.title: Ready for the next snow.
customer_reviews.text: Thank you, Thank you, Thank you!! My grandson loves this!!
customer_reviews.author: Robbie G. Carter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We love it! Its thicker so you don't feel every bump.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT AS PICTURED
customer_reviews.text: Received today. It was not anywhere close to picture. The entire design was different. There is NO natural curve. I am so disappointed with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cory  Nanney

customer_reviews.title: Arrived slightly faulty.
customer_reviews.text: This arrived slightly faulty. It wasn't bad enough to return it, but it should not have been shipped in that state really (and the cost of shipping was $15, which is pretty high). The underside is not completely smooth. There is a long indentation going straight across the sled from one side to the other, as if someone had bent the sled in half for a long time. I don't know if this will affect how it goes down a hill. Having this little inverted ridge all the way across, isn't great. I doubt this happened in shipping, since the box was not damaged.
customer_reviews.author: charliegg

customer_reviews.title: Piece of crap
customer_reviews.text: This is the WORST sled we have ever owned. Would not go down a hill filled with snow. If I could return it I would.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: We had such a great time with this on our last snow we had
customer_reviews.text: We had such a great time with this on our last snow we had. Looking forward to the next snow this weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not all that
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than it looks, graphics not as cool as the pic, very flimsy low quality. I returned it
customer_reviews.author: Miguel

customer_reviews.title: Super fast sled - highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Super fast sled, very well made, the kids fly down the hill - definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: TJackson

customer_reviews.title: great quality for a product about $30
customer_reviews.text: Sled is very sturdy and good looking. Rides very well, recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Singer

customer_reviews.title: Good fun
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! My girls have only used it once but they liked it. I like that it is light so it's less cumbersome to lug up and down a sled hill!
customer_reviews.author: Cory Christensen

customer_reviews.title: 11 year old son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this foam board because my son broke his plastic board. He loves this board. The length is perfect for him. He is 5'3" tall.
customer_reviews.author: Mayan Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Love these. Had a lot of fun with my ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Had a lot of fun with my kids. You can't hardly steer them though- they kind of just go where they go. But they're durable and fast.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew E. Powell

customer_reviews.title: It was a buy again item.
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the sled but when I went on a steep hill, it broke
customer_reviews.author: Reese Otter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this fly's down the hill really fast seems to be well made
customer_reviews.author: Daniel in maine

customer_reviews.title: Flexible flyer  Snow screamer sled
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much satisfied ,the only experience that I found with this product that it tends to curl up in the front other than that we loved it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So so sled
customer_reviews.text: The sled works well.Very fast but one of the handles broke the second day we had it.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Wagner

customer_reviews.title: wrong item
customer_reviews.text: I received the wrong sled and it looks very cheap, not at all as shown, need to return
customer_reviews.author: Maureen S.

customer_reviews.title: Better than the saucers because you can hold the handles ...
customer_reviews.text: This sled was more expensive than most on Amazon, but so worth it. My kids fight over it so I wound up buying a second. It is the most popular sled on the hill. Better than the saucers because you can hold the handles while getting a running start. And the quality is much better than other sleds sold with this design. My three boys give this sled a beating and it is holding up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Eliot

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME Gift, excellent packaging
customer_reviews.text: Sent it as a Christmas gift to my nephews in Philly. AWESOME Gift, excellent packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flexible Flyer Sled.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, would buy again. With the winter we have had, this sled has already gotten a lot of use. It is holding up well, and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Makes me wish for more snow days!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, endless fun!! We were flying down the hills and couldn't get enough. It does go fast, so down go with your kids if they are small.
customer_reviews.author: mattie rush

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loved it! Was excited that it flew down the hills. It was enjoyed by many of the kids in the neighborhood.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Stone

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The family had a blast on these in the snow.
customer_reviews.author: marc

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Item was true to image and description, however the weather has not permitted use at this time
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's my sons
customer_reviews.text: Not much snow this year or last to be able to use it to properly rate it. I do know that the handles break through the sled
customer_reviews.author: Lori L. Daugherty

customer_reviews.title: Looks good!
customer_reviews.text: Looks good. No snow yet to really try it out.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Flexible flyer Sled
customer_reviews.text: These sleds are sooooo fast. They are light & durable. They go right over fresh snow without making a path. My family loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Fast, Not Rugged
customer_reviews.text: While the sled was nice and fast, the bottom got ripped up on the first time out.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great LIGHT sled
customer_reviews.text: Sled is perfect for a nine year old. We've only used it once so far and it did get "bends" in the pastic but it seems to still work fine and goes really fast. My daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: A very snowy winter has put these to th test. Kids say not much steering power but they go fast so we're staying away from the tree infested hills
customer_reviews.author: ReaderCustomerHonestReviewer

customer_reviews.title: Very good present
customer_reviews.text: We decided this would be a very good present for our nephew and indeed he was delighted! You should have seen his smile!
customer_reviews.author: Maria N.

customer_reviews.title: It was pretty slow at first but as the kids kept using ...
customer_reviews.text: It was pretty slow at first but as the kids kept using it the ride became much faster. So far we have only used it one time since we havent had anymore snow. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Vivid design, and the best sled out there!
customer_reviews.text: Works great here in Ohio! Purchased for sledding with my nephews. The bottom is very slick plastic and it works great to help compact the snow and makes the best sled paths! This does catch quite some speed going down a steep hill! Great price as well! Cheaper than most of the stores around and shipped in a big box and was undamaged! The designs are vivid as well! Does not look or feel cheap, and I feel it will last for years!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla C.

customer_reviews.title: Great fun
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and son love Flexible Flyer Snow Screamer. It fast maneuverable and fun. I will buy another next year so my kids stop fighting over it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Louise Byrd

customer_reviews.title: Used it 10 times and it held up
customer_reviews.text: The red handles made of foam rubber are starting to tear, but we didn't have any damage as mentioned in other reviews. I used it together with two kids at the same time, (300 lb combined weight) and it held up OK. It is not as fast as inflated tire type of sled, but it is still fast enough. It does not take too much space. We were taking it skiing in the car.
customer_reviews.author: Zoran Lazarevic

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as pictured! Seems well made.... my grandson loves it and that's the most important thing!!!
customer_reviews.author: Diane David

customer_reviews.title: the 3 pack of these sleds was a good buy.
customer_reviews.text: For the money, the 3 pack of these sleds was a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

product_meta.title: Flexible Flyer Snow Screamer 2-Person Snow Sled
feature_bullets: Family sled - this Flexible Flyer 2-person foam sled is perfect for families. Light weight makes it easy for kids to carry this 2-man sled back up hill
Double sled - this Twin sled is large enough for 2 snow-sled riders. 4 handles ensure that both riders have a secure grip on this sled for 2
Cushioned protection - thick cushioned foam bobsled absorbs bumps, providing a smoother ride than hard plastic Sno sliders and thin flat sleds
Durable - constructed of 1” polyethylene foam laminated between a durable top layer and a super-slick crack-resistant hard plastic sled bottom
Fast - Slick super sled bottom flies down hills and glides over new snow instead of 'digging in' Like many traditional play sleds. For even more speed, wax sled bottom
Kids & adults sled - Snow sled for adults and kids age 5 and up. 47 x 21. 5 x 2 inches. Weighs 3 lbs. Foam kids bobsled holds 250 lbs.

Our Promise - Flexible Flyer has been producing sleds since 1889. We stand behind our products 100%. If you have any issues, search for “Flexible Flyer sled paricon” online and contact us through our website. We will make things right

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
